DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerance compare availability pharmacokinetic drug interaction CKD-501 metformin administer alone combination healthy male volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers dose three time period CKD-501 0.5mg metformin 1000mg alone , repeat dos five day . In addition , CKD-501 0.5mg metformin 1000mg administer simultaneously use repeatedly five day . Every time medication safety drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion rate , expect conduct test .
DOC.criteria: Between 20 age 45 age healthy male Weight 55kg , IBW 20 % within range FPG 70~125 mg/dL Agreement write informed consent Clinically significant disease ( liver , heart , immune system , Respiratory system , Endocrine system , blood tumor disease , Mental illness ) history learn Test drug may affect absorption gastrointestinal disease history learn Hypersensitivity reaction drug Clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction history party AST , ALT level 1.5 time creatinine clearance le 80mL/min systolic blood pressure le 100mmHg 150mmHg , diastolic blood pressure le 60mmHg great 95mmHg Substance abuse , history drug abuse show positive party Medication within 2 week first professional medical , medicine , OTC , vitamins take Previously participate trial within 2 month Medication within 2 month make whole blood donation medication within 1 month component blood donation Continued drunk clinical trial drink 10 cigarette day last 3 month average smoker clinical trial smoke Containing grapefruit food ingest clinical trial ingest Containing caffeine food ingest 24 hour admission hospital ingest
